article_metadata.description: MACOMB – McDonough District Hospital is taking care of everyday business while also learning to navigate sea changes in the healthcare industry.The MDH board met Monday night to discuss progress on the hospital’s participation with an accountable care organization (ACO) operated by the National Rural Accountable Care Consortium.  ACOs formed in response to escalating healthcare costs and poor health outcomes of Medicare patients with multiple health issues in rural areas. They
article_metadata.author: Michelle Langhout Staff Reporter
